Hero.title: Crousty Chicken
Hero.subtitle: The best crispy chicken in Brussels

Menu.title: Our Dishes
Menu.originalDesc: Warm rice with house sauce, plain chicken, Sweet & Sour sauce and fried onions. The simple and effective classic.
Menu.spicyFriesDesc: Generous cheddar fries, crispy-tender hot chicken, Sriracha Mayo + Hot Shot combo. Fresh jalapeños, spring onions and fried onions on top. A real spicy explosion!
Menu.vegeFriesDesc: Crispy fries with melted cheddar, falafels (vegan), double garlic sauce + Sweet & Sour. Peppers, spring onions and fried onions. A generous vegetarian option full of flavour.
Menu.bbqLoverRiceDesc: Warm rice topped with house sauce, chicken (hot or plain) with BBQ sauce. Fried onions and spring onions. A generous and comforting dish with BBQ flavours.
Menu.vegeRiceDesc: Warm rice topped with house sauce, falafels (vege), double garlic sauce + Sweet & Sour, peppers, spring onions and fried onions. A tasty and well-balanced vegetarian dish.
Menu.bbqLoverFriesDesc: Crispy fries with melted cheddar, chicken (hot or plain) topped with BBQ sauce. Fried onions, spring onions and corn. A gourmet combo for BBQ lovers.
Menu.spicyRiceDesc: Warm rice, hot chicken, duo of spicy sauces (Sriracha Mayo + Hot Shot). Fried onions, spring onions and jalapeños. A bold and flavourful bowl for spicy lovers.
Menu.fiftyFiftyBoxDesc: 50% cheddar fries, 50% rice with house sauce, chicken (hot or plain), SweetySweet + Sweet & Sour sauces. Fried onions, spring onions and corn. The perfect combo for the undecided.
